attributes.action: Step in and defend Hong Kong against Chinese tyranny.
attributes.additional_details: The Chinese government have blatantly disregarded the conditions of the 1997 agreement to reunite Hong Kong with China by forcing their own dictators into the Hong Kong legal system and because of this the UK government has a legal obligation to step in and protect people that were once our citizens.
attributes.background: We have all seen the disgusting way Hong Kong citizens are being treated by the Chinese government. Something must be done and the UK is the only country that has a right to do so.

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the UK Government or Parliament to take a specific action.

We're not sure exactly what you'd like the Government or Parliament to do. 

You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do.

You might like to sign this petition: 

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/264610
